text: Barguelonne-en-Quercy is a commune in the Lot department in south-western France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Saint-Daunès (the seat), Bagat-en-Quercy and Saint-Pantaléon.Arrêté préfectoral 28 September 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Lot department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Lot (department) Category:Populated places established in 2019
title: Barguelonne-en-Quercy
